notes: CRITICAL: MODNet does NOT have special handling in the Docker harness unlike DeepChem/OGGM/Scanpy. The Dockerfile must be modified to add: `if echo "$extracted_pkgs" | grep -q 'modnet'; then echo 'pymatgen' >> /testbed/instance_requirements.txt && echo 'matminer' >> /testbed/instance_requirements.txt; fi;`. The pickled training data contains MODNet-specific objects that cannot be deserialized without modnet installed.
